name: dragon-fang
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Dragon moves by 20%.
short_effect: Held: Dragon-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a hard and sharp fang that ups the power of Dragon-type moves.
flavor_text.platinum: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a hard and sharp fang that ups the power of Dragon-type moves.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It is a hard and sharp fang that ups the power of Dragon-type moves.
